                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%96%E5%8D%AB%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E5%BB%BA%E8%AE%AE%E5%90%84%E5%9B%BD%E9%87%8D%E7%82%B9%E5%85%B3%E6%B3%A8%E4%B8%89%E4%B8%AA%E9%A2%86%E5%9F%9F%23&amp;from=default">#世卫组织建议各国重点关注三个领域#</a>】当地时间4月4日，世界卫生组织发布第75期新冠肺炎疫情报告。报告显示，截至欧洲中部时间4月4日10时（北京时间4日16时），全球新冠肺炎确诊病例为1051635例，较前一日增加79332例；死亡56985例，较前一日增加6664例。<br>此前一天，世界卫生组织总干事谭德塞表示， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBRzDFS5f" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490240779979349:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490240779979349&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4490238686534212" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBRwgrpQw?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 06:36" date="1586039790000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490238686534212:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 06:36</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A4805%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#意大利新增确诊4805例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A124632%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#意大利累计确诊124632例#</a>】根据意大利民事保护部门公布的最近数据，截至当地时间4月4日18时，意大利现有新冠肺炎确诊病例88274例，死亡15362例，治愈20996例，累计确诊病例124632例，较4月3日18时新增确诊4805例，新增681例死亡病例。（韩硕） ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490237143120934" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBRtMd5TE?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 06:30" date="1586039422000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490237143120934:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 06:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#美国疫情#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%8730%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠肺炎确诊超过30万例#</a>】据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学发布的全球新冠肺炎数据实时统计系统，截至美国东部时间4月4日13时53分，全美新冠肺炎确诊病例突破30万。全美共报告新冠肺炎确诊300915例，死亡8162例，治愈14459例。（张梦旭） ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490131400353868" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBOJe1u3y?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 23:30" date="1586014211000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490131400353868:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 23:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/PBP2P" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【夜读：爱我们的亲人，就是珍惜他们在身边的每一天】爸爸妈妈吃了苦受了累，还是会惦记着我们的胃口，担心天气干燥我们会上火。爱我们的亲人，就是珍惜他们在身边的每一天；对亲人最好的思念，莫过于不徒留遗憾，将他们始终暖暖揣在心间，始终微笑着向前。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4490131400353868:1022-article:1022%3A2309404490131401736289:page_100206_home:2803301701:4490131400353868:2803301701" title="【夜读】爱我们的亲人，就是珍惜他们在身边的..." href="http://t.cn/A6ZEBTBs" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZEBTBs" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_longwb">°</i>【夜读】爱我们的亲人，就是珍惜他们在身边的...</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                                                  </div>  
            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>   
</div></div>
    </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490129379276119" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBOFXCV8P?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 23:22" date="1586013729000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490129379276119:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 23:22</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://weibo.com/" rel="nofollow">演奏 · 视频社区</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%A7%E5%8F%94%E5%90%89%E4%BB%96%E5%BC%B9%E5%94%B1%E6%80%80%E5%BF%B5%E9%80%9D%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#大叔吉他弹唱怀念逝者#</a>】“你知不知道，思念一个人的滋味，就像喝一杯冰冷的水，然后用很长很长的时间，一颗一颗流成热泪”……无论如何，都要告诉自己，带着思念继续前行。（演唱：B站UP主&nbsp;&nbsp;三哥漫时光）&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4490129379276119:1034-video:1034%3A4490128568025117:page_100206_home:2803301701:4490129379276119:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZE1xfp" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZE1xfp" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490122793354698" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBOvle4I2?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 22:55" date="1586012159000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490122793354698:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 22:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BF%99%E6%98%AF%E4%BB%8A%E5%A4%A910%E7%82%B9%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%23&amp;from=default">#这是今天10点的中国#</a>】在这场抗击疫情的斗争中，我们遭遇了太多突如其来的告别。他们，是挺身而出的凡人、是血脉相连的同胞、也是生死相依的亲人。今天，举国志哀，五星红旗为人民而低垂。10点的中国，在哀悼中诉说不舍，在低首中鼓起前行的勇气。风雨过后，生活还将继续；逝者安息，生者更当坚强！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490116283984063" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBOkQgIr5?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 22:30" date="1586010607000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490116283984063:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 22:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content">
                                                                                                                        【人民微评：守卫人间烟火，可敬！】一名外卖小哥的默哀流泪，让人动容。因为那一刻情感普遍共振，因为他就是我们中的普通一员，更因他道出了人们的朴素心声。哪有凭空生成的山河无恙，哪有触手可及的现世安稳，哪有理所当然的平安生活。致敬英雄，致敬每位守卫人间烟火的平凡英雄。                                            </div>
                                                                        <div class="WB_feed_expand">
                    <div class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg1_br"></i></div>
                    <div class="WB_expand S_bg1" node-type="feed_list_forwardContent">
                                                                            <div class="WB_info">
                                <a suda-uatrack="key=feed_headnick&amp;value=transuser_nick:4490071518558017" node-type="feed_list_originNick" class="W_fb S_txt1" nick-name="人民日报" bpfilter="page_frame" href="/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_">@人民日报</a><a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a>                            </div>
                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        【当鸣笛声响起，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E5%8D%96%E5%B0%8F%E5%93%A5%E4%B8%8B%E8%BD%A6%E9%BB%98%E5%93%80%E6%B5%81%E6%B3%AA%23&amp;from=default">#外卖小哥下车默哀流泪#</a>，“他们值得我们尊重”】举国志哀的时刻，北京街头的外卖员郑宏旭下车默哀，流下眼泪。他说：“心情特别沉重，面对疫情，我感觉只有国家强大，人民生活才会幸福。这么多为了我们平安生活的人献出了宝贵的生命，或者有些人放弃了与家人团圆的机会，这些都是值得 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490071518558017:2803301701" href="/2803301701/IBNaDzUkx" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490071518558017">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                                            </div>

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【约翰斯·霍普金斯大学：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%87%E5%85%AD%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#全球新冠肺炎死亡病例超过六万#</a>】美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学最新发布的数据显示，截至美国东部时间4日上午8时（北京时间4日20时），全球新冠死亡病例超过6万例，达到60115例。数据显示，目前死亡病例最多的国家为意大利，达14681例。此外，西班牙死亡病例达11744例，法国死亡病 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBOaBwNeI" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490109937815764:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490109937815764&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

    </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490104409869944" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBO1GFpCE?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 21:42" date="1586007776000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490104409869944:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 21:42</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B7%9D%E8%97%8F%E7%BA%BF%E7%AA%81%E5%8F%91%E9%9B%AA%E5%B4%A9%E6%AD%A6%E8%AD%A6%E7%B4%A7%E6%80%A5%E6%95%91%E6%8F%B4%23&amp;from=default">#川藏线突发雪崩武警紧急救援#</a>】4月3日，西藏东南部出现降雪，致使川藏线波密县境内牛踏沟段突发雪崩，60米路基被覆盖，850多辆过往车辆滞留。武警某部交通第三支队紧急启动应急救援，清理路面积雪1600立方米，雪崩道路被成功抢通，滞留车辆全部安全通过。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4490104409869944:1034-video:1034%3A4490103167582246:page_100206_home:2803301701:4490104409869944:2803301701" title="央视军事的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZE95UR" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZE95UR" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视军事的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%87110%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全球新冠肺炎超过110万例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E278458%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠肺炎278458例#</a>】截至北京时间4月4日16时，205个国家和地区累计确诊1099737例，钻石公主号邮轮712例，累计死亡58843例。转发关注<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E8%B5%B0%E5%8A%BF%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎疫情全球走势#</a>。 ​ ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IBNGplZSq&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Frmrb&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609511701&amp;ssig=%2FBJGDTv%2BKn" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490091215242746" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBNGplZSq?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 20:50" date="1586004630000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490091215242746:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 20:50</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/19DcdW" rel="nofollow">微博视频</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【你们听见了吗？<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BF%99%E6%98%AF%E4%BB%8A%E6%97%A5%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E7%9A%84%E5%A3%B0%E9%9F%B3%23&amp;from=default">#这是今日中国的声音#</a>】今天清明，全国哀悼，你是否记得这些声音？清晨，天安门广场国歌响起后举行下半旗；10时，防空警报鸣响，汽车、轮船同时鸣笛…这一天，山河同悲，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B8%85%E6%98%8E%E8%8A%82%E5%93%8D%E5%BD%BB%E7%A5%9E%E5%B7%9E%E5%A4%A7%E5%9C%B0%E7%9A%84%E5%A3%B0%E9%9F%B3%23&amp;from=default">#清明节响彻神州大地的声音#</a>，致敬英烈、告慰逝者。风雨过后，生活还将继续，生者自当勇毅前行！&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBNGplZSq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490091215242746:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490091215242746&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490082121334604" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBNrK5BbS?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 20:14" date="1586002462000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490082121334604:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 20:14</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【泪目！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%239%E5%88%86%E9%92%9F%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E5%9B%BE%E5%8D%B7%23&amp;from=default">#9分钟的中国抗疫图卷#</a>，你看见自己了吗？】这张<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E5%9B%BE%E5%8D%B7%23&amp;from=default">#中国抗疫图卷#</a>，时长9分钟，它记录了我们每个人的经历。缅怀同胞，致敬英雄！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4490082121334604:1034-video:1034%3A4490125766230045:page_100206_home:2803301701:4490082121334604:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZE3mcO" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZE3mcO" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4490071518558017" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBNaDzUkx?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 19:32" date="1585999934000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490071518558017:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 19:32</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【当鸣笛声响起，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E5%8D%96%E5%B0%8F%E5%93%A5%E4%B8%8B%E8%BD%A6%E9%BB%98%E5%93%80%E6%B5%81%E6%B3%AA%23&amp;from=default">#外卖小哥下车默哀流泪#</a>，“他们值得我们尊重”】举国志哀的时刻，北京街头的外卖员郑宏旭下车默哀，流下眼泪。他说：“心情特别沉重，面对疫情，我感觉只有国家强大，人民生活才会幸福。这么多为了我们平安生活的人献出了宝贵的生命，或者有些人放弃了与家人团圆的机会，这些都是值得 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBNaDzUkx" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490071518558017:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490071518558017&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/6626772698" usercard="id=6626772698">快乐小甜儿</a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member4"></em></a>：这个冬天没能把一群可爱的人留住，但是等这个春天过去了，我会把鲜花和微风留在夏天，微风吹起鲜花的浪漫，鲜花渲染微风的芳香，另一群可爱的人置身其中，我们大家一起享受春天过后的美好，享受夏天到来的生机盎然！        </div>

                                <a name="4490060956964910" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBMTBtdTg?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 18:50" date="1585997415000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490060956964910:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 18:50</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/PBP2P" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【人民日报评论员：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BC%85%E6%80%80%E9%80%9D%E8%80%85%E5%8B%87%E6%AF%85%E5%89%8D%E8%A1%8C%23&amp;from=default">#缅怀逝者勇毅前行#</a>】清明时节，追思悠悠。2020年4月4日，中华人民共和国举行全国性哀悼活动，全国各族人民对抗击新冠肺炎疫情斗争牺牲烈士和逝世同胞致以深切哀悼，全国和驻外使领馆下半旗志哀，全国停止公共娱乐活动。这是对逝者的深切缅怀，是对生命价值的崇扬。风雨过后，生活还 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBMTBtdTg" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490060956964910:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490060956964910&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                                                                                                                                                                                            <!-- LinkCard6 -->
        <!--区别处理-->

                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IBMOf4i3c&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609511711&amp;ssig=CkT5%2BErBiW" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490057631022702" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBMOf4i3c?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 18:37" date="1585996623000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490057631022702:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 18:37</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2330%E5%A4%9A%E5%9C%B0%E6%8E%A8%E5%87%BA%E6%B6%88%E8%B4%B9%E5%88%B8%23&amp;from=default">#30多地推出消费券#</a>，专家建议：精准投放，避免物价上涨】近期，南京、杭州、宁波等30多座城市纷纷推出几百万元到上亿元不等的消费券，旨在激发居民消费热情，帮助部分受疫情冲击大的行业加快恢复。专家表示，要把好事办好，明确发放流程，注重精准投放，避免出现物价上涨。<a title="消费券如何发" href="http://t.cn/A6ZRrkMo" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZRrkMo" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>消费券如何发</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490049472807061" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBMB5bMfb?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 18:04" date="1585994678000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490049472807061:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 18:04</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【今天，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%9A%E5%9B%BD%E9%A9%BB%E5%8D%8E%E4%BD%BF%E9%A6%86%E4%B8%8B%E5%8D%8A%E6%97%97%E5%BF%97%E5%93%80%23&amp;from=default">#多国驻华使馆下半旗志哀#</a>】4月4日，中国举国同哀，多国驻华使馆也纷纷用自己的方式表达，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%9A%E5%9B%BD%E9%A9%BB%E5%8D%8E%E4%BD%BF%E9%A6%86%E5%8F%91%E5%BE%AE%E5%8D%9A%E5%93%80%E6%82%BC%23&amp;from=default">#多国驻华使馆发微博哀悼#</a>。环球同此凉热，人类是休戚与共的命运共同体。面对疫情，没有任何国家可以独善其身，唯有团结合作才能共同应对。携手并肩，共同抗疫！ ​​​​                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490044657924844" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBMtjxfC4?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 17:45" date="1585993530000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490044657924844:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 17:45</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A7026%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙新增确诊7026例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E8%B6%8512%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙累计确诊超12万例#</a>】据西班牙卫生部4日公布的数据，西班牙较前日新增新冠肺炎确诊病例7026例，新增死亡病例809例，累计确诊病例达124736例，其中11744人死亡，34219人治愈出院。（人民日报记者姜波） ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                <ul class="clearfix">
                    <!-- 投诉 -->

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>

                                <span class="hover">

        </div>
    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490036634331843" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBMgniaUr?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 17:13" date="1585991617000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490036634331843:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 17:13</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://weibo.com/" rel="nofollow">正能量 · 视频社区</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【铭记！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%82%A3%E4%BA%9B%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%AD%E7%9A%84%E5%8B%87%E6%95%A2%E4%B8%8E%E7%88%B1%23&amp;from=default">#那些疫情中的勇敢与爱#</a>】这个寒冬，我们经历了很多次突如其来的告别，他们是人民警察、是白衣天使、 是抗疫一线逆行的战士……他们用生命保护了我们，他们拥有最勇敢的心与最广博的爱。只要思念还在，他们就并未离去。向守护生命的勇士致敬！&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4490036634331843:1034-video:1034%3A4490023119028247:page_100206_home:2803301701:4490036634331843:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZRO6V6" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZRO6V6" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        <!-- super card-->

                                                                                    <!-- feed区 大数据tag -->
                    </div>
        <div class="WB_like" node-type="templeLike_ani" action-data="parise_id=p_0000" style="display:none;">

                                <a name="4490030997504412" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBM7hvueU?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 16:51" date="1585990273000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490030997504412:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 16:51</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%E7%82%B9%E8%A7%82%E5%AF%9F%E6%9C%9F%E6%BB%A1%E8%BF%9B%E4%BA%AC%E6%8E%AA%E6%96%BD%23&amp;from=default">#北京发布第一入境点观察期满进京措施#</a>】在今天北京市召开的新闻发布会上，北京市委组织部副部长张强发布了关于入境人员在第一入境点观察期满进京有关政策措施：<br><br>①入境人员须在第一入境点进行14天集中医学观察。观察期满经核酸检测为阴性的，解除医学观察后，就地分流，各自返回目的地。<br><br>②在第一 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBM7hvueU" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490030997504412:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490030997504412&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【力挺中国！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8A%A0%E6%8B%BF%E5%A4%A7%E5%8D%AB%E7%94%9F%E9%83%A8%E9%95%BF%E9%A9%B3%E6%96%A5%E5%A4%96%E5%AA%92%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E9%80%A0%E5%81%87%E9%98%B4%E8%B0%8B%E8%AE%BA%23&amp;from=default">#加拿大卫生部长驳斥外媒中国数据造假阴谋论#</a>】当地时间4月2日，有记者在加拿大疫情例行记者会上挑事提问称“中国数据造假”，加拿大卫生部长帕蒂·哈伊杜表示：“没有迹象表明从中国传出的有关其感染率和死亡率的数据有任何伪造。”之后，她批评该名记者试图灌输一种网络上流行的“阴谋论 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBM0amgJU" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490026585307566:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490026585307566&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <p class="icon"><span class="W_icon icon_rederrorS"></span></p><p class="txt">由于用户设置，你无法回复评论。</p>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490022961460169" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBLUk67R7?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 16:19" date="1585988357000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490022961460169:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 16:19</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E9%A3%8E%E8%AD%A6%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#战疫风警线#</a>【致敬！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%BC%AB%E7%94%BB%E7%89%88%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%E7%9A%84%E8%AD%A6%E5%AF%9F%23&amp;from=default">#漫画版战疫一线的警察#</a>】多年后回想起2020年，我们或许会发现，这场浩大的疫情防控战，其实是一场跨越冬天的漫长旅程。一幕幕战疫一线的感人画面，汇聚成中国警察最可爱的模样。他们，是家人的软肋，更是人民的铠甲。春天来了，他们其中的一些人再也没能看到花开，但在这个通往春 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBLUk67R7" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490022961460169:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490022961460169&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609511711&amp;ssig=CkT5%2BErBiW" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490017500110092" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBLLw0sDG?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 15:57" date="1585987055000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490017500110092:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 15:57</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【国家粮储局：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%BB%A5%E6%9D%A5%E6%B2%A1%E5%8A%A8%E7%94%A8%E8%BF%87%E4%B8%AD%E5%A4%AE%E5%82%A8%E5%A4%87%E7%B2%AE%23&amp;from=default">#疫情以来没动用过中央储备粮#</a>】国家粮食和物资储备局粮食储备司司长秦玉云：疫情发生以来，粮食和物资储备部门加强市场粮源调度，有序组织拍卖政策性粮源，有效保障了市场需求。目前为止，没有动用过中央储备粮，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%99%A4%E4%B8%AA%E5%88%AB%E5%B8%82%E5%8E%BF%E5%A4%96%E7%BB%9D%E5%A4%9A%E5%9C%B0%E5%8C%BA%E6%B2%A1%E5%8A%A8%E7%94%A8%E8%BF%87%E5%9C%B0%E6%96%B9%E5%82%A8%E5%A4%87%E7%B2%AE%23&amp;from=default">#除个别市县外绝多地区没动用过地方储备粮#</a>。顺便提醒一下，在家里大米、 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBLLw0sDG" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490017500110092:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490017500110092&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                        今日15时38分，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B8%85%E6%98%8E%23&amp;from=default">#清明#</a>。让春风拂去伤痛，遥寄哀思。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%98%A5%E5%A4%A9%E5%BE%88%E5%A5%BD%E5%8F%AA%E6%98%AF%E5%BE%88%E6%83%B3%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#春天很好只是很想你#</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609511711&amp;ssig=CkT5%2BErBiW" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490015130763190" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBLHH3cxw?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 15:48" date="1585986490000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490015130763190:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 15:48</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【农业农村部：近期<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E7%B2%AE%E4%BB%B7%E4%B8%8A%E6%B6%A8%E4%B8%BB%E5%9B%A0%E6%81%90%E6%85%8C%E6%80%A7%E6%B6%88%E8%B4%B9%23&amp;from=default">#国际粮价上涨主因恐慌性消费#</a>】农业农村部发展规划司司长魏百刚介绍，受疫情影响，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E7%B2%AE%E9%A3%9F%E4%BB%B7%E6%A0%BC%E7%A1%AE%E5%AE%9E%E6%9C%89%E6%89%80%E4%B8%8A%E6%B6%A8%23&amp;from=default">#国际粮食价格确实有所上涨#</a>。当前，从全球供应总量来看不存在短缺问题，目前更多是疫情造成的恐慌性消费。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E5%AF%B9%E5%9B%BD%E5%86%85%E7%B2%AE%E9%A3%9F%E5%B8%82%E5%9C%BA%E5%BD%B1%E5%93%8D%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%23&amp;from=default">#国际对国内粮食市场影响有限#</a>，3月份我国大米零售每公斤6.6元、面粉每公斤3.95元，价格稳 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBLHH3cxw" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490015130763190:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490015130763190&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!-- 查看对话 -->
                                        <!-- 查看对话 -->
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>
                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=6049302919&amp;cid=4490015411645264&amp;nick=upup13521&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2803301701&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-4 15:49</div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490008787956520" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBLxsxnQY?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 15:22" date="1585984978000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490008787956520:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 15:22</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【农业农村部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%89%E4%BF%A1%E5%BF%83%E5%86%B3%E5%BF%83%E7%AB%AF%E7%89%A2%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E9%A5%AD%E7%A2%97%23&amp;from=default">#有信心决心端牢中国人饭碗#</a>】农业农村部种植业管理司司长潘文博回应网友关心的粮食抢购问题：多年粮食丰收，库存较为充裕；今年夏粮丰收有望，春播进展顺利；口粮完全自给，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E5%AF%B9%E5%9B%BD%E5%86%85%E7%B2%AE%E9%A3%9F%E5%B8%82%E5%9C%BA%E5%BD%B1%E5%93%8D%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%23&amp;from=default">#国际对国内粮食市场影响有限#</a>；米面随买随有，不必囤积抢购。我们有信心决心端牢中国人饭碗。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBLxsxnQY" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490008787956520:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490008787956520&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%9C%E4%B8%9A%E5%86%9C%E6%9D%91%E9%83%A8%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E8%A6%81%E4%B8%8D%E8%A6%81%E5%9B%A4%E7%B2%AE%23&amp;from=default">#农业农村部回应要不要囤粮#</a>：没必要】农业农村部发展规划司司长魏百刚透露，①我国粮食产量连续5年稳定生产；②人均粮食占有量持续高于世界平均水平；③粮食库存量充足，库存消费比远高于17-18%的安全水平；④谷物进口数量不大，仅占谷物消费量的2%左右。即使<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%86%85%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%A5%E9%87%8D%E6%97%B6%E6%9C%9F%E4%B9%9F%E6%98%AF%E7%B1%B3%E9%9D%A2%E6%97%A0%E5%BF%A7%23&amp;from=default">#国内疫情严重时期也是米面无忧#</a>，更没 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBLvnt3KF" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490007496925937:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490007496925937&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%85%AC%E5%B8%83%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E1%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%AF%A6%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#武汉公布新增1例本土病例详情#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E4%B8%BA%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85%E8%BD%AC%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%23&amp;from=default">#武汉确诊病例为无症状感染者转确诊#</a>】2020年4月3日0时-24时，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E1%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#武汉新增1例本土病例#</a>。确诊病例为无症状感染者转确诊。患者居住在硚口区荣华街建国社区金玉华庭小区。该患者1月23日起一直居家，自2月20日起曾多次前往小区门口取团购食品和快递，每次团购物品拿回家后 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBLu575DC" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490006691689972:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490006691689972&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                                                  </div>  
            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>   
</div></div>
    </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【国家卫健委：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%8E%B0%E6%9C%89%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E9%99%8D%E8%87%B3900%E4%BE%8B%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全国本土现有确诊降至900例以下#</a>】国家卫生健康委新闻发言人、宣传司副司长米锋介绍，全国本土现有确诊病例降至900例以下，无本土现有疑似病例，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E9%99%A4%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%A4%96%E8%BF%9E%E7%BB%AD30%E5%A4%A9%E6%97%A0%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%23&amp;from=default">#湖北除武汉外连续30天无本土新增#</a>。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4490005617704253:1042163-video:1042163%3A4490005549088805:page_100206_home:2803301701:4490005617704253:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZRLZnx" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZRLZnx" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490003109206674" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBLoiCD4K?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 15:00" date="1585983624000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490003109206674:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 15:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【人民直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%A1%E9%99%A2%E8%81%94%E9%98%B2%E8%81%94%E6%8E%A7%E6%9C%BA%E5%88%B6%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#国务院联防联控机制发布会#</a>】国务院联防联控机制15时召开新闻发布会，介绍做好<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%9C%9F%E9%97%B4%E7%B2%AE%E9%A3%9F%E4%BE%9B%E7%BB%99%E5%92%8C%E4%BF%9D%E9%9A%9C%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%23&amp;from=default">#疫情期间粮食供给和保障工作#</a>情况，请农业农村部、国家粮食和物资储备局相关司局负责人等回答媒体提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 现场直播，一起关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4490003109206674:1034-video:1034%3A4490018161360935:page_100206_home:2803301701:4490003109206674:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZRwHFr" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZRwHFr" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2803301701/IBLoiCD4K&amp;mid=4490003109206674&amp;name=人民日报&amp;uid=2803301701&amp;domain=rmrb" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>333</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609511717&amp;ssig=hSFYtB3Qus" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489997874948310" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBLfRkLhs?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 14:39" date="1585982376000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489997874948310:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 14:39</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【让人心碎！19位牺牲勇士回家，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E6%98%8C%E5%B8%82%E6%B0%91%E5%93%AD%E5%96%8A%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%E8%B5%B0%E5%A5%BD%23&amp;from=default">#西昌市民哭喊英雄走好#</a>】4日，灵车载着西昌山火19位牺牲英雄的骨灰，将他们送回各自的家乡。灵车缓缓通过城区道路，许多自发前来悼念的市民沿途伫立，夹道目送。 英雄走好！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489997874948310:1034-video:1034%3A4489997844152343:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489997874948310:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZRP1q8" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZRP1q8" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489991604075105" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBL5Kh67v?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 14:14" date="1585980881000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489991604075105:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 14:14</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E8%B6%85110%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#全球新冠肺炎确诊超110万#</a>】据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学实时统计数据，截至北京时间4月4日13时1分，全球新冠肺炎确诊病例超过110万例，累计死亡逾5.8万例。截至目前，美国累计确诊新冠肺炎病例超过27万例，死亡病例超过7000例，是全球确诊病例数最多的国家。全美已有35个州和地区进入“重大灾难”状 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBL5Kh67v" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489991604075105:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489991604075105&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E4%B8%BA%E7%83%88%E5%A3%AB%E9%80%9D%E4%B8%96%E5%90%8C%E8%83%9E%E9%BB%98%E5%93%80%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山为烈士逝世同胞默哀#</a>】4月4日上午，当窗外响起防空警报，钟南山在办公室静立默哀，向抗击新冠肺炎疫情斗争牺牲烈士和逝世同胞表达深切哀悼。没有从天而降的英雄，只有挺身而出的凡人，致敬，缅怀！（中央纪委国家监委）&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489988022045879:1034-video:1034%3A4489987320643597:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489988022045879:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Z8rXG4" alt="http://t.cn/A6Z8rXG4" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/7362840672" usercard="id=7362840672">狗千</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//verified.weibo.com/verify"><i title="微博个人认证 " class="W_icon icon_approve_gold"></i></a><a class="icon_icon" title="微博铁粉" target="_blank" href="https://car.weibo.com/pc/view?page=123456"><i class="W_icon_bf icon_bigfans5"></i></a>：我语文不好，但我会写中国！ 我英语不好，但我会读China！ 我地理不好，但我知道地图上的雄鸡！ 我数学不好，但我记得960万平方公里和300多万海洋公域 我历史不好，但我永远不会忘记1949！ 此生无悔入华<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/ee/2018new_beishang_org.png" title="[悲伤]" alt="[悲伤]" type="face">        </div>

                                                                                                                        【举国同悲！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2390%E7%A7%92%E5%9B%9E%E9%A1%BE%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E9%BB%98%E5%93%80%E6%97%B6%E5%88%BB%23&amp;from=default">#90秒回顾全国默哀时刻#</a>】4月4日上午10时，北京的学生、湖北的外卖小哥、四川的森林消防、上海的地铁乘客、河南的警察、山东的工人…全国各地，各行各业的人停住脚步，为同胞默哀。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E9%BB%98%E5%93%80%E4%B8%89%E5%88%86%E9%92%9F%23&amp;from=default">#全中国默哀三分钟#</a>↓↓何以告慰逝者，以从悲痛从重振，以一个更好的中国！&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489986273357669:1034-video:1034%3A4489985869676558:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489986273357669:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Z81n95" alt="http://t.cn/A6Z81n95" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2381192%23&amp;from=default">#81192#</a>，我们从未忘却<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/6e/2018new_leimu_org.png" title="[泪]" alt="[泪]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;"><a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%8E%8B%E4%BC%9F%E5%A2%93%E5%89%8D%E6%9C%89%E4%BA%BA%E9%80%81%E6%9D%A5%E6%AD%BC20%E6%A8%A1%E5%9E%8B%23&amp;from=default">#王伟墓前有人送来歼20模型#</a>】3日，有记者赶到位于杭州安贤陵园的王伟烈士墓前，祭扫献花。在此之前，已有不少市民前来献过花。鲜花中间，还摆放着一架歼-20战斗机模型。陵园内一名工作人员说，“每年都有人来献花，祭奠他的人很多。”<a title="从未忘却！英雄王伟墓前19年来鲜花不断，今年..." href="http://t.cn/A6Z8nrx7" alt="http://t.cn/A6Z8nrx7" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>从未忘却！英雄王伟墓前19年来鲜花不断，今年...</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->
                
				     <!--picture_count == 4-->

                <ul class="clearfix">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">

        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->

                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E6%98%8C%E6%82%BC%E5%BF%B5%E6%A3%AE%E6%9E%97%E7%81%AB%E7%81%BE%E7%89%BA%E7%89%B2%E5%8B%87%E5%A3%AB%23&amp;from=default">#西昌悼念森林火灾牺牲勇士#</a>】今天，清明节，上午11时许，四川西昌市经久乡森林火灾牺牲勇士追悼会在西昌市殡仪馆举行。勇士们，一路走好！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B8%85%E6%98%8E%E7%A5%AD%23&amp;from=default">#清明祭#</a>（宋豪新 王波 王凡） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【武汉不会忘记！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E9%BB%98%E5%93%80%E4%B8%89%E5%88%86%E9%92%9F%23&amp;from=default">#武汉默哀三分钟#</a>】2020年4月4日10时，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E4%B8%BE%E8%A1%8C%E9%BB%98%E5%93%80%E4%BB%AA%E5%BC%8F%23&amp;from=default">#武汉举行默哀仪式#</a>，防空警报鸣响，武汉长江大桥、黄鹤楼、长江码头等地，行人驻足默哀、汽车轮船鸣笛。这座你们守护过的，热爱过的城，永远记得你↓↓&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489948818239954:1034-video:1034%3A4489946992410635:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489948818239954:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Z8tkxP" alt="http://t.cn/A6Z8tkxP" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    </ul>
                </div>

href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A124632%E4%BE%8B%23&from=default\">#意大利累计确诊124632例#<\/a>】根据意大利民事保护部门公布的最近数据，截至当地时间4月4日18时，意大利现有新冠肺炎确诊病例88274例，死亡15362例，治愈20996例，累计确诊病例124632例，较4月3日18时新增确诊4805例，新增681例死亡病例。（韩硕） ​​​​                                            <\/div>\n                                                                <div class=\"WB_expand_media_box \" style=\"display: none;\"                                                <a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%8730%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&from=default\">#美国新冠肺炎确诊超过30万例#<\/a>】据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学发布的全球新冠肺炎数据实时统计系统，截至美国东部时间4月4日13时53分，全美新冠肺炎确诊病例突破30万。全美共报告新冠肺炎确诊300915例，死亡8162例，治愈14459例。（张梦旭）                                                                                           【夜读：爱我们的亲人，就是珍惜他们在身边的每一天】爸爸妈妈吃了苦受了累，还是会惦记着我们的胃口，担心天气干燥我们会上火。爱我们的亲人，就是珍惜他们在身边的每一天；对亲人最好的思念，莫过于不徒留遗憾，将他们始终暖暖揣在心间，始终微笑着向前。 <a  suda-uatrack=\"key=tblog_card&value=click_title:4490131400353868:1022-article:1022%3A2309404490131401736289:page_100206_home:2803301701:4490131400353868:2803301701\" title=\"【夜读】爱我们的亲人，就是珍惜他们在身边的...\" href=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6ZEBTBs\" alt=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6ZEBTBs\" action-type=\"feed_list_url\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><i class=\"W_ficon                                                                                                              【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E8%BF%99%E6%98%AF%E4%BB%8A%E5%A4%A910%E7%82%B9%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%23&from=default\">#这是今天10点的中国#<\/a>】在这场抗击疫情的斗争中，我们遭遇了太多突如其来的告别。他们，是挺身而出的凡人、是血脉相连的同胞、也是生死相依的亲人。今天，举国志哀，五星红旗为人民而低垂。10点的中国，在哀悼中诉说不舍，在低首中鼓起前行的勇气。风雨过后，生活还将继续；逝者安息，生者更当坚强！                                                                                            【人民微评：守卫人间烟火，可敬！】一名外卖小哥的默哀流泪，让人动容。因为那一刻情感普遍共振，因为他就是我们中的普通一员，更因他道出了人们的朴素心声。哪有凭空生成的山河无恙，哪有触手可及的现世安稳，哪有理所当然的平安生活。致敬英雄，致敬每位守卫人间烟火的平凡英雄。                                            <\/div>\n                                                【约翰斯·霍普金斯大学：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\"                                                                                                              【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\"                                     <div class="cur_vol cur_volmute" style="width: 90%;" node-type="volume_range">

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <div class="opt_ctrl clearfix">

                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="fold_ctrl_area" title="展开" action-type="toggle_fold" node-type="toggle_fold"><div class="mask"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_unfold ico_fold"></a></div></div>
        <div class="lyric_wrap" node-type="lrc" style="display:none">
